title: "AI predicts physics of future fault slip in laboratory earthquakes"
excerpt: "An artificial intelligence approach borrowed from natural language processing—much like language translation and autofill for text on your smart phone—can predict future fault friction and the next failure time with high resolution in laboratory earthquakes."
